attributes.action: ensure Sally Sparrow becomes Doctor Who's assistant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sally Sparrow (played by Carey Mulligan) was a character in the superb Doctor Who episode 'Blink'. We the undersigned believe she would make an excellent assistant to Doctor Who and urge the Prime Minster to do whatever he can to ensure Sally Sparrow becomes his assistant.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
